tool_description: Cryptocurrency prices and charts. Free access to current data for Bitcoin and thousands of altcoins.
name: Binance Socket
title: Binance Socket

api_list.name: GET a SYMBOL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://binance-socket.p.rapidapi.com/symbol/BTC"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "binance-socket.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://binance-socket.p.rapidapi.com/symbol/{symbol}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "binance-socket.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
